title: Fireson Bay
description: Murder and intrigue sweep a quaint, Georgia town when Special Agent Fireson Bay stumbles onto the trail of a serial killer who has eluded capture for two decades. Together with the town coroner Dr. Lucretia Cook, Fireson uncovers staggering evidence leading to an impossible conclusion indicating the most unlikely suspect. In a race against time, the two sleuths track down the killer, only to learn they are the ones being tracked, and suddenly at the mercy of a sadistic murderer.
author: G.G. Stokes Jr.
